sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: select sa.protocol_app_node_id, sa.name, sa.description, sa.type_id, sa.type, sa.c_age_at_death, sa.c_geographic_location, sa.c_host, sa.c_morbidity, sa.c_organ, rg.genotypes from ApidbTuning.SampleAttributes sa, ApidbTuning.RflpGenotypes rg where sa.protocol_app_node_id = rg.protocol_app_node_id
